class django.core.handlers.asgi.ASGIRequest(scope, body_file)[source]

Bases: django.http.HttpRequest

Custom request subclass that decodes from an ASGI-standard request dict and wraps request body handling.

Handles the ASGI request. Called via the __call__ method.

Reads an HTTP body from an ASGI connection.

create_request(scope, body_file)[source]

Create the Request object and returns either (request, None) or (None, response) if there is an error response.

async send_response(response, send)[source]

Encode and send a response out over ASGI.

classmethod chunk_bytes(data)[source]

Chunks some data up so it can be sent in reasonable size messages. Yields (chunk, last_chunk) tuples.

get_script_prefix(scope)[source]

Return the script prefix to use from either the scope or a setting.
